Use `help [<command>]` for more info about a command.

**Commands:** `help` | `anime` | `doki` | `insult` | `moniquote` | `ost` | `dokipoem` | `prefix` | `waifu` | `nep` | `neko` | `vote`

Use `help` for a list of all commands.

commands.name: insult
commands.text:
`insult` | Commands related to the insult functionality. Submit an insult or toggle them on your server!

**Usages**
`insult submit <insult>` - Submit an insult every 24 hours! Include %user% where you want DokiBot to tag a user (Don't include brackets in <insult>)
`insult toggle` - Turns off/on the random insult functionality on your server

commands.name: doki
commands.text:
`doki` | Posts a random Doki Doki picture.

**Usage**: `doki [nsfw] [monika | sayori | yuri | natsuki]`

commands.name: ost
commands.text:
`ost` | Plays songs from the official Doki Doki OST

**Usage**: `ost <arguments>`

__Arguments__: `play [1-15]` | `playall` | `stop` | `pause` | `resume` | `skip` | `queue` | `clear` | `list`

commands.name: moniquote
commands.text:
`moniquote` | Posts one of Monika's quotes from the end of the game

**Usage**: `moniquote`

commands.name: dokipoem
commands.text:
`dokipoem` | Uses commands related to the doki-poems feature

**Usage**: `dokipoem <arguments>`

__Arguments__: `end` | `frequency (minute | hour | day)`

```# To use the doki-poems feature, your server needs a text channel named "doki-poems"```

commands.name: prefix
commands.text:
`prefix` | Set the prefix of the bot on your server! (Max of 3 characters)

**Usage**: `prefix <new_prefix>`

commands.name: waifu
commands.text:
`waifu` | Posts a picture of a waifu

**Usage**: `waifu [nsfw]`

commands.name: vote
commands.text:
`vote` | Sends a link to the voting site! Voting resets all active cooldowns.

**Usage**: `vote`
